brief.content-text: The diagram depicts three routers labeled R1, R2, and R3. They are arranged in a triangular configuration with serial links from R1 to R2, R2 to R3, and R3 to R1. The interfaces connecting the link between R1 and R2 are set to be passive, so no routing table updates are sent between R1 and R2. The RIP updates from all routers pass between the link between R1 and R3, and R3 and R2.
